Package it.polimi.ingsw.listeners

Class WorkerListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listeners.WorkerListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
BuildListener, DoubleMoveListener, MoveListener, RemoveBlockListener, SelectSpacesListener, WinListener
public abstract class WorkerListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener
WorkerListener class defines an interface used to communicate to View from Model.
